Home > sic-util > reduce_opacity

reduce_opacity() function ​

函数“reduce_opacity”将十六进制颜色透明度改变，得到同等规则下的颜色。

Signature:

typescript
reduce_opacity: (rgb: RgbColor, opacity: number) => RgbColor

Parameters ​

Parameter

Type

Description

rgb

RgbColor

RGB颜色代码，例如 [ 22, 34, 55 ]

opacity

number

**Returns:**

RgbColor

  • RGB颜色代码，例如 [ 69, 78, 95 ]
